General.Name: Pureun Mutual Savings Bank Co. Ltd
General.Description: Pureun Mutual Savings Bank Co., Ltd provides various banking products and services in South Korea. It offers term, retirement pension, savings, and ordinary deposits; loans products, including internet deposit-backed, mortgage, credit, and other loans; and bancassurance, credit card, and internet banking services. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
